import React from 'react' import imgFrameOne from '../../../lib/Extra/img-frame-white-border.png' import iheaderPlateOne from '../../../lib/Extra/header-plate-1.png' import {Recipe} from 'lib/types' interface Props { recipe: Recipe } /** * Displays a list of required ingredients for a recipe along with an image. */ const IngredientsList: React.FC = ({recipe}) => { const colorScheme = recipe.colorScheme return (

Ingredients

    {recipe.ingredients.map(ingredient => (
  • {ingredient}
    • ))}
) } export default IngredientsList
